homepage.title: Welcome to dashboard!
homepage.subtitle: - an application designed to showcase current web technologies and skills that i learned throughout my career. Developed with Next.js, React and enhanced by TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, it features a live Weather forecast, a Stock Tracker with visualizations powered by Highcharts, a News feed, and a Todo List. Data is managed using MongoDB Atlas alongside Next.js API routes and the application's functionalities are assured through Jest and Cypress testing. Animations are done with Framer Motion and internationalization support via i18next. Thank you for your visit!
